findings.rationale: The obligation to maintain confidentiality in perpetuity can create long-term uncertainties and liabilities for both parties, potentially hindering future business opportunities.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The lack of limits on indemnification may expose a party to significant financial risk without clear boundaries on liability.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit, arising out of any breach of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of liability limitations can lead to potentially catastrophic financial exposure in case of breaches or disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The unilateral assignment of intellectual property rights to one party may disadvantage the other party, potentially leading to disputes over ownership.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: The prevailing party's right to recover attorney's fees may discourage parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to the fear of incurring significant legal costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
